definition: to cooperate/concerted effort
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
surname Li
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously
to join forces/to give full cooperation

sentences.english: We sincerely hope of fully cooper-ate with old and new cutomers. to achieve mutual progress.
sentences.chinese: 同时诚望与各新老客户通力合作，共同拓展。

sentences.english: The new situation calls for intensified cooperation of the international community to jointly meet challenges.
sentences.chinese: 在此形势下，国际社会应通力合作，共迎挑战。

sentences.english: I believe now that cooperation is everything.
sentences.chinese: 我认为当务之急是要通力合作。

sentences.english: It should be a collaborative process for the whole region.
sentences.chinese: 拍电影，应该是整个地区通力合作的过程。

sentences.english: The musician and the librettist were collaborators.
sentences.chinese: 音乐家与剧作者通力合作。

sentences.english: To be successful, all of these teams must collaborate globally.
sentences.chinese: 要获得成功，所有这些全球分布的团队必须通力合作。

sentences.english: I can assure you of our close cooperation.
Concerted efforts must be made to further improve the teaching and learning of the language.
sentences.chinese: 各方必须通力合作，改善语文教学和学习方法。

sentences.english: From the above, one can see the vigorous cooperation between China-India in economic field.
sentences.chinese: 从中我们看到中印在经济领域的通力合作。

sentences.english: KONE is one of the leading companies in the global elevator and escalator business.
sentences.chinese: 通力是全球电梯和自动扶梯行业最大的公司之一。

sentences.english: KONE is one of the largest elevator and escalator companies in the world.
sentences.chinese: 通力是世界上最大电梯和扶梯提供商之一。

sentences.english: This was cooperation and democracy at their best.
sentences.chinese: 这是通力合作和民主作风的大发扬。

sentences.english: KONE has acquired Long Elevator & Machine Co.
sentences.chinese: 通力已经收购了龙电梯及机械有限公司。

sentences.english: Full co-operation among team members has a direct impact on the success or failure of the team.
sentences.chinese: 团队成员的通力合作也对会直接影响团队成功的失败。

sentences.english: This acquisition further improves KONE's strong position in each of those markets.
sentences.chinese: 此次收购进一步提高了通力在这些市场的强势地位。

definition: to join forces/to give full cooperation
to coordinate closely/to act in close partnership with
(honorific) your kind efforts/thanks to your help
to unite in common effort

to provide assistance/to aid
to know all about/to be informed of all the details
to make do in difficult circumstances by being resourceful/(of circumstances) difficult/challenging/(of a budget) tight/(of a man-made thing) makeshift/rough and ready
to consider and decide/to decide after investigating
